alert.note: Alert for Cheshire; Coastal Rockingham; Eastern Hillsborough; Northern Grafton; Southern Grafton; Sullivan (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 28 at 3:04AM EST until March 01 at 12:00AM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...LOW PRESSURE TO BRING ACCUMULATING SNOW TO THE REGION THROUGH THIS EVENING... .An area of low pressure approaches this morning before pulling away from the region tonight. Snow has overspread the southwestern areas and will expand northeastward through this morning before tapering off tonight. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT EST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Snow. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 7 inches. Downsloping could result in lower amounts in the CT Valley. * WHERE...Portions of central, northern, and southern New Hampshire. * WHEN...Until Midnight EST tonight. * IMPACTS...Periods of moderate and heavy snow will combine with low visibility to create dangerous driving conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Tuesday morning and evening commutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by going to newengland511.org
